title: Bridget Hunt
deck: I am married with four grown up children but no grandchildren yet! At Gateway I have been leading a women’s life group (together with Louise Manning), and I also help with Alpha and teach the New Start course. I am passionate about getting new Christians ‘planted’ in the church and about supporting persecuted Christians in other countries (by praying and writing them letters). Otherwise I work full time as an administrator at York University and enjoy sewing, art, walking and vegetable gardening.
